website_summaries.verdict: The Tiger Chef bar set arrives in a single gift box, which can cause some minor damage. We believe it is a solid kit for home use and mixology practice. Good housewarming present.
pros: Owners praise the quality of the muddler and shakers
Strainer catches very small particles for a smoother drink
cons: Shakers do not interlock with each other

customer_reviews.title: which for the price is pretty good. Main defect in the set is the ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is certainly meant for a novice home bartender, which for the price is pretty good. Main defect in the set is the fact that the "16oz shaker" is way too small to be of any use and it doesn't seal with the "28oz shaker" either. Also, the description of the jigger did not specify a measurement size. Comments by other buyers stated they had received a 1oz jigger. I received a rather unexpected 1 1/4 oz jigger. All of the other pieces in the set are of expected quality for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And I am glad I did it
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and then I was really worried about the shaker not working properly... but I still went ahead and ordered it, And I am glad I did it! This is the best set ever! I ordered this set only for the shaker and jigger and I love it! Even muddler and bar spoon are awesome. I haven't use anything else from the set and I probably wont... but its really good for the price. Cons: In making anything with shaker full of ice - the shaker gets too cold
customer_reviews.author: Shots!

customer_reviews.title: It is a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. It is a good quality product, and the recipient was very happy with all the items included (it was all they wanted and more). My original shipment did not arrive by its projected arrival time and looked like it was not going to arrive before Christmas. I contacted Tiger Chef, who then sent me another package on one-day air which arrived in time. I am very pleased with the product and the customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for house parties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my in house bar so when I bring my friends over, they would be impressed by my magical bartending skills. They thought I was cool, and the products are of a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ardenas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Arrived earlier than expected which worked better for me. Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice compliment to my new bar. Everything you need in one package.
customer_reviews.author: MARY EARNEST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really fun to make drinks with this, no complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chang

customer_reviews.title: Just What the Mixologist Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and it was all put to use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Malitz

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with rust on multiple pieces of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bar set. The only slight problem is with the small cup. It goes up too far into the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C

customer_reviews.title: One alcoholic beverage in the evenings may benefit your health!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! In a recent AARP article on older persons, one of the things that was mentioned is that an alcoholic beverage in early evening was a good thing so I bought this set to have a Cosmopolitan some evenings. It is very nice quality and I will enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: rungirlrun

customer_reviews.title: ... got this present for a gift exchange and everybody loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this present for a gift exchange and everybody loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: You get all that you need, and then some! Good quality, a full set for home entertainment. Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Favorite47

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the boston shaker set to interlock with each other but they don't fit well together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my boyfriend who enjoys bartending when ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend who enjoys bartending when our friends come over. He loves it and (as some reviews say) the shaker does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pourers are good.
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality was ok, but some pieces had cosmetic scratches and the spoon had what appeared to be a rust spot. The jigger is an odd unit of measure, pourers are good.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Products very useful. Delievered earlier than expected. Make it a 15-piece by adding Ice Scoop. Still, total satisfaction!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles E Younger

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to get started with a basic home bar.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Byer

customer_reviews.title: good value. Minor imperfections
customer_reviews.text: For the price, good value. Minor imperfections, cheep packaging, but delivers quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is a good product im quiet enough sastifacy but the order wasnt ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a good product im quiet enough sastifacy but the order wasnt complete because was missing the opener beer bottle
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Salas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the pieces broke the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but the person who made this product has clearly never bartended. You can't fit anything in this shaker! The top of the shaker is way to small!! Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Stay classy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nice little set because I wanted to be able to make cocktails on demand and this definitely does the job. I think I have made a new cocktail almost every night with it. It has been fun so far learning some new recipes and trying out different drinks that I have never tried before. All of the tools that come with it seem high quality and are nice looking enough to keep on display. Once you have this, all you need is the booze to get started crafting your cocktails. I think this (along with maybe a book of cocktail recipes) would make a perfect housewarming gift or birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful set for home mixers
customer_reviews.text: This set has been very solid. All the tools I needed. The shakers are good size and sturdy. Everything holds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hamai

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This set actually came with more pieces that I needed. The shaker works great, which is just what I wanted. The bottle tops don't fit all sized bottles. For the price, this is a good set. though not the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set with all the basic supplies. Very effective muddler! Better than the one I had at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister's birthday. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Farr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice indeed to use for my home bar
customer_reviews.text: Items came packaged together. Very nice indeed to use for my home bar. Though the cork screw had some liquid on it, washed it off and still no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Yazzie

customer_reviews.title: I love this shaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaker!! I've had no issues with any of the items included. I just wish it had come with a carrying bag
customer_reviews.author: Tajuana D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke this bad boy in last night, everything worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Praying for Reviews

customer_reviews.title: ... for fathers day I was impressed to see how sturdy everything
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for fathers day I was impressed to see how sturdy everything was
customer_reviews.author: Christian Ryan Aubuchon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of tools for bartending. Love mixing drinks with the Boston Shaker!
customer_reviews.author: Piano player 500

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The set it self seems nice. Crappy packaging. This was ordered for a gift and it comes in a clear bag with everything shoved in.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

product_meta.title: Tiger Chef 14 Piece Stainless Steel Cocktail Bar Tool Set
product_meta.description: Size:14 Piece Set| Color:SilverTiger Chef 14-piece Stainless Steel Bar Set and Cocktail Making Set Includes Bar Tools and Accessories You need the right tools to make a great cocktail. Tiger Chef's 14-piece Bar Utensil Set includes everything you need to create everything from old fashioned, mint juleps or trending artisanal cocktails. This 14 piece kit features high quality tools that are great for the professional at work or for any home bar. Bar Utensils Set Includes - (1) 28 oz. Shaker - (1) 16 oz. Shaker (used to cap the 28 oz.) - (1) 11 inch Bar Spoon - (1) Stainless Steel 4-Prong Bar Strainer - (1) Jigger - (1) Corkscrew - (6) Clear Plastic Bottle Pourers - (1) 7 inch Flat Bottle Opener - (1) Netted Head Mudler
feature_bullets: Setting Up Your Own Little Bar? Make sure that you get these entertaining essentials.

High Quality Stainless Steel Set Includes (1) 28 oz. Shaker, (1) 16 oz. Shaker (used to cap the 28 oz.), (1) 11 inch Bar Spoon, (1) Stainless Steel 4-Prong Bar Strainer, (1) Jigger, (1) Corkscrew, (6) Clear Plastic Bottle Pourers, (1) 7 inch Flat Bottle Opener and (1) Netted Head Muddler.
Shake, stir, and serve! Includes everything you need to set up your own little bar.
Great for Professionals or Home Bar Enthusiasts – Enjoy being the cocktail superstar with this complete bar mixing set.
The Only Bar Tool Set With 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - Buy with confidence because we offer a Money Back Guarantee if you do not love this product!
